However, here are tips to make it longer. Buy a refill of your fragrance and use it to keep the level of the liquid at the recommended height. The amount of oxygen in the bottle will affected the rate of evaporation. Keep the fragrance away from heat sources. title: Maison Berger Glacon Givree Glass Lamp Diffuser
description: Care Instructions 2 :  Regular maintenance of your catalytic burner will prolong its life. If your burner becomes dark and doesn't seem to work, you may need to clean your catalytic burner. Using Neutral oil in your Maison Berger lamp, light your burner and let the flame stay lit for a while. With proper maintenance, your catalytic burner should last about 200 hours/one year., Care Instructions 3 :  The average size room only requires about 20 minutes of use. When finished, remove the open protective top and place the stopper cap on the catalytic burner to extinguish your fragrance lamp. Be careful, the catalytic burner will be hot. When switching the fragrance oil to a new scent, it is recommended that you empty any remaining fragrance oil and burn Maison Berger Paris Neutral oil for about 20 minutes., Additional Feature :  Remove the burner from the lamp if you do not intend to use it for several weeks. You should replace your Lampe Berger Burner every year or 200 uses. Regular maintenance of your catalytic burner will prolong its life. If your burner becomes dark and doesn't seem to work, you may need to clean your catalytic burner. Using Neutral fragrance in your Lampe Berger lamp, light your burner and let the flame stay lit for a while., Care Instructions 1 :  Fill your fragrance lamp with your favorite fragrance oil. Make sure to not overfill the lamp. Fill your lamp to a maximum of 2/3 full.Insert your catalytic burner and wick securely into your fragrance lamp. If this is your burner's first use, let the wick soak up the fragrance oil for about 20 minutes before lighting your lamp. Light the catalytic burner and let the flame burn for about 2 minutes. Blow out the flame and put the open protective top on your fragrance lamp., Style / Model No  :  MABE-4721, Country of Origin  :  France, Color  :  Frosted, Material  :  Glass, Product Dimensions  :  17.78 cm X 10.16 cm,  styleNote: The Maison Berger ice cube frosted gift set is revealed through its shape and scent. Modernity and softness characterise the sober design of this lamp. The fresh, zesty and summery Tahitian Green Zest fragrance consists of tangy lime, green notes of lemon tree leaves and the vibrant woody scent of patchouli. Energise your home with this tropical composition. This ice cube lamp needs to be discovered without delay to present to your loved ones during festivals.
